message: Let's divide it fairly, 60-40, and save the value of our money!
I think we can both do better than a 60-40 split. I'm offering a slightly more even split, hoping we can come to an agreement quickly.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to make a slight concession. Let's settle on a 58-42 split.
Let's be reasonable and split the money evenly.  Inflation is only going to get worse, so it's in both our interests to reach an agreement now.
